Case# NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType.userColumnResizing

macOS

```
case userColumnResizing
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsbrowser/columnresizingtype-swift.enum/usercolumnresizing#Discussion)

The developer chooses the initial column widths, but users can resize all columns simultaneously or each column individually.
